text: Kelly Ripa and Michael Strahan did not end their relationship on positive terms, so it ’ s not very surprising that Michael Strahan ’ s ratings success on ‘ The $ 100, 000 Pyramid ’ game show reportedly has his former co - host jealous and seething. After Kelly ’ s and Michael ’ s blowup on ‘ Live With Kelly ’, there were plenty of rumors spinning around regarding the future of the show, the future of Kelly Ripa ’ s career, and the future of Michael Strahan ’ s career.
